name: Composition J
description:
Be the first to play our games: Sign up for our mailing list!

Draw walls, build combos, and clear 3D boxes in this minimalist puzzler. Keep a box on screen when another one clears to combo up. Balls only break through walls that are still growing so time your new walls carefully.

This game features "Post-neoplasticism," based on Piet Mondrian's Neoplasticism, the art is composed of only axis aligned boxes colored red, yellow, blue and the non-colors black and white.

  • Music: Stephen Webster
  • Sound Design: Jordan Fehr
  • Game: Michael Silverman
